Frequently asked questions

What's included in the free trial?
Our 14-day free trial includes all features of the selected plan, giving you full access to test the platform before committing. No credit card required to start.
Can I switch plans later?
Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. When upgrading, you'll be prorated for the remainder of your billing cycle. When downgrading, changes take effect at the end of your current billing period.
Do you offer discounts for startups?
Yes! We offer special pricing for early-stage startups that are pre-seed or participating in recognized accelerator programs. Contact us for more details.
How do investor verifications work?
To maintain a high-quality network, we verify all investor accounts. The process typically takes 1-2 business days and may require proof of previous investments or professional credentials.
Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your plan will remain active until the end of your current billing period.
What payment methods do you accept?
We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and wire transfers for annual enterprise plans.
